original_text: The king of Israel replied, ‘Tell King Ben-Hadad, “Do not boast when you are preparing for a battle. Wait until the battle has finished and you know that you have won.” ’
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 대답하여 이르되 갑옷 입는 자가 갑옷 벗는 자 같이 자랑하지 못할 것이라 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: when you are preparing for a battle
Wait until the battle has finished
and you know that you have won
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 이겼다는 것을 알게 될 때까지
